subject: Order #SSN4353 The baseplate is missing and the brake pedal is making loud noises.
description_text:
Hello, I'm still waiting for a reply.

What about the hydraulic damper?

And what about the tracking number for the base plate with footrest?

Where is your support?

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Sven Hoffmann, Please provide a video so that I can check where the brake noise is coming from. You can upload it via Google Drive and set the appropriate viewing permissions. I will then provide a solution based on the video.

Hello, I hope you can watch the video using this link.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HfObnIgG5gjfEoeY9TVBPNRgkpoXDZYT/view?usp=drivesdk


The pedals didn't include a base plate or LED plate for resting your feet.
Will these be supplied separately?


Von meinem/meiner Galaxy gesendet



-------- Ursprüngliche Nachricht --------

Hi, were you able to watch the video?
The noise is definitely coming from the hydraulic dampers. The piston rod has 2-3 millimeters of play at the beginning before it encounters resistance. And then there's that knocking noise every time.

Best regards,

Sven Hoffmann



Von meinem/meiner Galaxy gesendet



-------- Ursprüngliche Nachricht --------

Hello, I wanted to politely ask why support is taking so long to respond?

Do you have a solution you can offer me regarding the brake noise, the missing base plate, and the LED footrest?

Sincerely

Sven Hoffmann



Von meinem/meiner Galaxy gesendet



-------- Ursprüngliche Nachricht --------

Hi Sven Hoffmann,  The video you provided does not have viewing permissions set; please adjust the settings. Additionally, you can try compressing the 8-step adjustable damper on the brake slightly, then secure the two large nuts to prevent loosening. The missing base plate was shipped separately, and I have urged operations to provide the tracking number.

The video should now be released.



Von meinem/meiner Galaxy gesendet



-------- Ursprüngliche Nachricht --------

Hi Sven Hoffmann,    Your order was scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are arranging for them to be stocked and shipped via DHL Express. We will update you with the tracking number within the next couple of days.

Okay, thanks for the info.

And what about the knocking noise, which can happen if there's too much play in the hydraulic damper before it hits resistance?



Von meinem/meiner Galaxy gesendet



-------- Ursprüngliche Nachricht --------

Would you please send me a new hydraulic shock absorber?

And I'll send the other one back to you? The loud knocking noise is really annoying me while driving.



Von meinem/meiner Galaxy gesendet



-------- Ursprüngliche Nachricht --------

Hello, I'm still waiting for a reply. What about the hydraulic damper? And what about the tracking number for the base plate with footrest? Where is your support?

Gesendet von Outlook für Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Sven Hoffmann,    We sincerely apologize for the delay in responding to you and any inconvenience this may have caused. We will immediately arrange for the replacement of the base plate and hydraulic shock absorber .
Hi Sven Hoffmann,    Here is your replacement link. It is expected to arrive on the 12th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047222228908
ID 为 7577 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7577  
      主题: Order #SSN4353 The baseplate is missing and the brake pedal is making loud noises.  
      描述:  Hello, my pedals from order #SSN4353 are missing the baseplate completely, and the brake pedal makes a very loud noise. It sounds like metal is hitting metal, coming from the damper. Is this normal? If so, I would like to cancel the purchase.
 Alternatively, I would like a new set of pedals where the brake pedal doesn't make this noise.  
 
 
 
 Sincerely, Sven Hoffmann 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Von meinem/meiner Galaxy gesendet
Hi Sven Hoffmann,     Here is the latest tracking information for your reference.
